entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Typo in AuthenticationMetrics.cs description #61311
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61308
  • Figma Code Connect for Blazor #61307
  • WebApplicationFactory doesn't set solution relative content root if you switch to slnx solution #61304
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi: Enum type is missing when using JsonStringEnumConverter #61303
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url #61301
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url, json, tls-handshakes-httpsys #61300
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json_middleware, mTls-handshakes-httpsys #61299
  • Perf improvement: json #61298
  • Issue with OpenAPI Documentation Generation When Using [FromQuery] in a Separate Class #61297
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.ResponseCaching.Tests.CachedResponseBodyTests.Copy_MultipleSegments #61293
  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.EmptyUnary #61291
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/9.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #61290

Closed

  • Starting Community Triagers process in our repo #48512
    Discussions
  • Blazor: StateCannotChange() method to lock the UI #61279

PullRequests

Created

  • Typo in AuthenticationMetrics.cs description #61312
    area-networking
  • Add Baseline package validation #61310
    area-infrastructure
  • update community-triager list #61309
    area-infrastructure
  • `HttpNavigationManager` no longer uses `NavigationException` #61306
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-navigation, 10.0-preview4
  • Search for slnx files when setting solution-relative content root #61305
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Remove unnecessary newline at the end of the webapiaot csproj #61302
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Quarantine: Copy_MultipleSegments #61294
    area-middleware
  • Quarantine EmptyUnary #61292
    area-grpc

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `c2ceb2b` to `52204f7` #61203
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • Include all required shims when building in VMR #61282
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • Quarantine `EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnBackwardsForwardsAction` #61191
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4
  • [release/8.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61216
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.16
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade to Ubuntu 22 #61215
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.5

Updated

  • Migrating to the new solution file format - .slnx #61273
    area-infrastructure
  • Rename MapSchemasEndoints.cs to MapSchemasEndpoints.cs #61073
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview4
  • Add InvokeNew, GetValue & SetValue to JS interop API #61246
    area-blazor
  • Add host.docker.internal and host.containers.internal to the dev cert SAN #61265
    area-commandlinetools
  • [main] (deps): Update dotnet/arcade requirement to 4bb78555b1275bc6cb21f6d61f7de60b0605edc3 #61204
    area-infrastructure
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview4
  • Revert "Revert "[release/9.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60353
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0.x
  • Revert "Revert "[release/8.0] Update remnants of azureedge.net"" #60352
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos/FTS: enable full text search and vectors on collections once Cosmos supports wildcards in paths for their indexes and container policies #35898
  • Cosmos: cleanup CosmosModelValidator to use helper methods rather than FindAnnotation in various validation methods #35897
    10.0.0
  • Cosmos: rename CosmosIndexBuilderExtensions.ForVectors to IsVectorIndex #35895
    10.0.0
  • Conditional SelectMany cannot be translated #35894

Closed

  • Can't subquery a view on SQL Server #35885

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge branch 'release/9.0' =>'release/9.0-staging' #35896
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0-staging' => 'release/9.0' #35891
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' =>'release/8.0-staging' #35893
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #35772

Updated

  • Cosmos Full Text Search support #35868
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #35769

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor App WebView2 Fails Silently When Installed to C:\Program Files #28792
  • In Label text unicode superscript character trims itself at the edges, not showing completely and didn't not wrapped #28791
  • Keyboard overlaps WebView in MAUI #28790
  • FormattedStringExtensions.MeasuredLineHeight needs double specifier in default value of type PropertyMetadata #28789
  • Udefined Text in MAUI TimePicker on iOS #28786
  • Animating an item in collectionview does not work #28785
    Backlog
  • Android TimePicker ignores 24 hour system setting when using Format Property #28784
    Backlog
  • FontImageSource Color Not Updating After Navigation with Dynamic Theme Switching in .NET MAUI #28782
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] Published bundle does not contain all platforms #28796
  • I8_Headers_and_Footers-The footer "2019" is displayed in the header position #28658
    .NET 9 SR6
  • I1_Vertical_list_for_Multiple_Rows - Rotating the simulator would cause clipping on the description text. #28657
    .NET 9 SR6
  • HttpClient - Uploading file through API is taking more time in .NETMAUI(.NETCore 8.0) compared to Xamarin.Forms #28788
  • [Android] Using mutliple SearchBars with Navigation cause wrong behavior #28781
  • Label doesn't show in the Grid with WebView on Android #28778

PullRequests

Created

    community ✨
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr4] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28794
    .NET 9 SR4.2
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr5] [iOS] CollectionView footer sizing when source is empty - fix #28793
  • Fixed Test case failure in PR 28486 #28780
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion, test-flight
  • [Android] Fixed the CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed" #28779
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 7 #28764
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [android] fix `Android` namespace conflicts #28771
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 8 #28496
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28636
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix iOS CollectionView not reacting properly to orientation changes #28670
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [net9.0] Update packages on net9.0 branch #28773
  • Obsolete platform-specific ListView APIs #28758
    t/breaking 💥, area-controls-listview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [main] [ci] Add maui release internal #28776
  • Add back TextTransformUtilites #28735
    p/0, area-controls-general, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Add maui release internal #28772

Updated

  • [iOS] Replaced MeasureInvalidated with IPlatformMeasureInvalidationController for Shell Flyout's Footer #28775
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell
  • [iOS] - Fix Custom FlyoutIcon from Being Overridden to Default Color in Shell #27580
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 6 #28747
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [xamlc] convert `{OnIdiom}` to `OnIdiomExtension<T>` #28700
  • [2025/04/07] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [WiP] SafeArea #28556
    area-layout, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] - Fix Visual State Issue with Picker TextColor After Navigation #28746
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #28661

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Delete the workaround for CodeLens tests failing #77995
  • Quick Info stops working after clicking in any define constant in code #77992
  • Null resilient props should not get nullable initial state in constructors #77991
  • Creating a Source Generator results in an empty RS1042 #77988
  • Rename crashes with source generated partial method signatures #77986
  • Update inconsistent text in analyzer for Null-conditional Assignment #77985
  • MSBuildWorkspace (or the workspaces API) should have a simple way to get all diagnostics for a project #77980
    Backlog
  • Apps using MSBuildWorkspace should have some way to pick the appropriate version to match their SDK #77979
  • MSBuildWorkspace NuGet package adds unexpected items in Solution Explorer #77978
  • Override completion broken for Razor documents with code behind #77976
    17.14 P3

Closed

  • Cannot load Analyzers programatically from MSBuildWorkspace #31797
    Backlog
  • Question: How do you get non cs files using the MSBuildWorkspace? #32059
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace: Loading a solution with a ProjectReference prevents compilation #36072
    Backlog
  • Erroneous IDE0028 warning #77962
  • MSBuildWorkspace analyzer results are different in .NET 9.0.200 SDK compared to 9.0.103 and manual compilation #77255
  • MSBuildWorkspace failing to load VS 2017 projects; strange output in Diagnostics #37105
    Backlog
  • Duplicate projects in solution loaded into MSBuildWorkspace #16262
    Backlog
  • WorkspaceDiagnostic Issue Error #43683
    Backlog
  • `MSBuildWorkspace` does not recognize the `Remove` attribute for MSBuild items in an ItemGroup #21275
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace doesn't support projects with public signing #13325
    Backlog
  • Duplicated project when reading sln when multiple TargetPlatforms are specified #56806
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace failing (with a WARNING) when loading a .csproj with COMReference #36414
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace OpenProjectAsync fails under mono #20848
    Backlog
  • .NET Core Console Application : MSBuildWorkspace does not exists in current context compilation error #21584
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Project.Documents.Count returns 0 even when the actual .csproj project has .cs files #25370
    Backlog
  • Error in MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync: "exePath must be specified when not running inside a stand alone exe" #21799
    Backlog
  • Diagnostic Error: Msbuild failed when processing the file #26414
    Backlog
  • Exception : C:\Program Files (x86)\MSBuild\Microsoft\VisualStudio\v10.0\WebApplications\Microsoft.WebApplication.targets not found #24709
    Backlog
  • Call OpenSolutionAsync () Documents Is Empty,Is my MSBuild version wrong? #30471
    Backlog
  • AnalyzerRunner throws exceptions at MSBuildWorkspace.Create #35812
    Backlog
  • OpenSolutionAsync appears to die quietly #38875
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace shouldn't attempt to remove properties declared in an imported file #38971
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.d18initial-10502.05 #77975

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix crash in backing field nullability cycle scenario #77993
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add diagnostic provider for clients without dynamic registration #77984
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Revert "Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread" #77983
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused elements form PublishData.json #77994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid potential disposal exception during MEF shutdown #77990
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Add new message for getting registered method names #77989
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • More changes to how we load gladstone extensions. #77987
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Move to immutable dictionary #77981
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: misc checks on receiver parameter and extension members #77937
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, VSCode, breaking-change, Next
  • Add ignored directives feature status #77965
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Feature - Ignored Directives, Next
  • Extensions: update feature status #77923
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged, Next
  • Remove workaround for https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/10306 #77974
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add test demonstrating issue was fixed. #77963
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Additional changes to the gladstone PR. #77977
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

Updated

  • Change SolutionState.ProjectStates from an ImmutableDictionary<ProjectId, ProjectState> to an ImmutableArray<ProjectState> #77971
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Expression trees: optional arguments #77972
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce main thread switches in VisualStudioProjectFactory.CreateAndAddToWorkspaceAsync #77920
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77444
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Move Copilot context provider to EA.Copilot and handler to LanguageServer #77973
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Execute core compiler from full framework msbuild #77914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Revert "Remove unnecessary flag in diagnostics subsystem" #77891
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: ref safety analysis #77967
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, breaking-change

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • osx-x64 Release AllSubsets_Mono_Minijit_RuntimeTests minijit build leg fails to build with an error referencing a macosx12.0 #114248
  • Interlocked.CompareExchange<UInt128> Does Not Work on ARM64 (Mac M1) #114247
  • The 'wasi-experimental' workload is not supported in .NET 9 #114236
    Future
  • CI flakiness: iOS builds failing with SDK errors #114235
  • [browser] EP testing #114232
    10.0.0
  • File.Move (overwrite) unreliable because FileShare.Delete access of target file ignored #114230
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' during 'Importation' #114229
    10.0.0
  • [8.0] GC Large array test failure #114222
  • Console APIs missing `[UnsupportedOSPlatform("wasi")]` #114221
    Future
  • Help Needed: Error NU1101 While Building Custom ODBC Wrapper #114220
  • c0000005 at SHA256.HashData #114219
  • [android] EventPipe loader events on CoreCLR Android mixes relative/absolute paths. #114217
  • [android] Nettrace collected on CoreCLR Android including JIT+Loader events won't display in Perfview Loader/JITStats views. #114216
  • JIT: `InstanceBasedFunctionPointer(useExplicitThis: True)` test fails with tailcallstress #114213
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed `IsVNConstantBound(vn) || IsVNConstantBoundUnsigned(vn)` during 'Assertion prop' #114212
  • Apple Sillicon Rosetta2 .NET9 deadlock #114206
  • JIT: See if we can/should replace heap class layouts by custom layouts #114205
  • JIT: We can remove `getTypeForBoxOnStack` #114204
  • [Question] Need help obtaining assembly dependencies #114202
  • [mobile] Replace `<TrimMode>link</TrimMode>` in mobile targets #114198
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Mark DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes.All as EditorBrowsable(Never) #114197
  • 在一个EXE应用程序中调用多个由.NET9 AOT发布的动态库so文件会引发异常 #114193
  • [API Proposal]: change 'Unsafe.AsPointer' parameter to be 'ref readonly' #114189

Closed

  • App WPF .NET 9.0.3 x64 portable error WMI in Windows 8.1 #114118
  • [API Proposal]: Enable easier comparisons across and within StringSegment instances #114239
  • Atomic<T> for primitive types in .NET #114242
  • PackedSimd fails to find interpreter intrinsic #114088
    10.0.0
  • StringComparer.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase abnormal behavior on some OS #114208
  • .NET Runtime - missing correct version! #114175
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests timeout #114177
  • Test failure: JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/LocallocCnstB5_ro/LocallocCnstB5_ro.dll #114181
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add WaitOneAsync to EventWaitHandle #114199
  • Multiple test failures when connecting to corefx-net-http11.azurewebsites.net #110578
    10.0.0
  • Linux build fails randomly with "Unable to load shared library 'jitinterface_x64'" error in crossgen #111731
    10.0.0
  • Runtime support for Swift Interop in .NET 10 #108662
    10.0.0
  • [Swift Interop] Lowering fixed buffers #107620
    10.0.0
  • Adding support for fully managed name resolution APIs or as app-level toggle #42185
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 2 Regressions on 3/16/2025 11:54:41 PM +00:00 #113936
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [DRAFT] Split up loader heap implementations #114246
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove jitstress-isas-sve pipeline #114245
    needs-area-label
  • Fix the encoding for sve_mov #114244
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][interp] Add aliases for Vector128.Load and Vector128.LoadUnsafe #114243
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Create error message when `UnmanagedCallersOnly` is used with `DllImport`. #114240
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2678830 #114238
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add HashSet check to Enumerable.Distinct #114237
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Disable, by default, `CLRConfig` settings on DAC builds. #114234
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Adjust for culture name normalization in AssemblyNameInfoFuzzer #114231
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • GetType: keep throwing same exceptions as .NET 8 #114228
    area-System.Reflection
  • Moved a static field initialization from Thread to ProcessorIdCache #114227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [S.N.Quic] Observe exceptions in ResettableValueTaskSource #114226
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [HttpStress] Track unobserved exceptions #114225
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #114224
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #114223
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ILLink : Fix and a couple tweaks #114215

    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, linkable-framework, os-wasi

    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Projection tooling features for Swift interop #3071
  • Future use-cases for Swift interop #3070
  • [Swift shipping] Improve testing framework #3068

Closed

  • [Swift projection tooling] Consider removing MachO logic as we are using TBD files instead #3047
  • [Swift shipping] Implement testing framework #2850
  • [Projection tooling] Surface build errors #3006
  • [Projection tooling] Add symbols from dynamic library to type database #2918
  • [Projection tooling] Update demangler to ignore unknown nodes #2954
  • [Projection tooling] Implement Demangler query methods #2665
  • [RuntimeAsync] Implement struct async thunks. #3011

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Use explicit store types #3072

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Fix handling of implicit byref liveness #3067
  • [Swift bindings] Update `README.md` with new tooling console arguments #3069
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift Bindings] Emitter redesign proposal #3059
    area-SwiftBindings
  • Use prototype roslyn compiler #3062

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add support for tool@version to tool install commands #48155
  • Misleading Compile Error Message - "You must either set PublishSingleFile to false or set UseAppHost to true." #48152
  • Force dotnet reference add without checking for validity #48148
  • Hot reload Model issue with WebAPI project #48145
  • Difficulty maintaining compatibility with installed .NET versions due to NuGet package versioning #48144
  • Show build error summary in latest console output when running dotnet run or dotnet watch and suppress warnings #48143
  • Error dialog when creating a .NET 10.0 WinForms project: You must install or update .NET to run this application #48126

Closed

  • Migration to SLNX creates incorrect configuration mappings #48010
  • Add path to global.json SDK version lock #8254
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48154
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not use live shims for tools packages in VMR #48153
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48149
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Auto enable retry when detected #48142
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix truncated symbols paths in log output from CreateSdkSymbolsLayout #48147
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make it possible to prep other RIDs and architectures #47956
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48127
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48121
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Generate Link elements based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #47915
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • Remove duplicated azl cert declarations #48146
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow container targets to be loaded in more scenarios, even if the targets will be skipped #47693
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • Force OCI format for inner images when publishing tarballs or to local docker instances #47398
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • [release/8.0.4xx] add a flag to let users opt into serial builds of inner-RID containers #47475
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers, 8.0.16
  • Update to the latest application insights #47924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add ux for retry in dotnet test #48075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48098
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Exploration of ideas for supporting multiple files in dotnet run file #47672
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Simplify logic around _MTPBuild target #48097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool-install: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet format failure to handle slnx files #47508
    Area-NetSDK, DO NOT MERGE
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Improve MTP dotnet test exit code messages #47979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Optimize compression #47734
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
